#summary save([parameterize])
#labels api,1.0

*Category*:

[ModelObjectFunctions Model Object Functions]

*Description*:

Saves the object if it passes validation and callbacks. Returns `true` if the object was saved successfully to the database.

*Return Type*:

Boolean

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

|| *Name* || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *parameterize* || any || false || #application.settings.save.parameterize# || Set to `true` to use `cfqueryparam` on all columns when saving or pass in a list of property names to use `cfqueryparam` on those only ||

*Examples*:

{{{
<cfset user.save()>
}}}

{{{
<cfif user.save(parameterize=false)>
  <cfset FlashInsert(notice="The user was saved!")>
  <cfset redirectTo(action="userEdit")>
<cfelse>
  <cfset FlashInsert(alert="Error, please correct!")>
  <cfset renderPage(action="userEdit")
</cfif>
}}}
